content.subtitle: Personal Information
content.text: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, update your profile, or contact us for support.

content.subtitle: Health Data
content.text: With your explicit consent, we may collect health-related information including medical history, medications, and appointment data to provide personalized healthcare services.

content.subtitle: Usage Information
content.text: We automatically collect information about how you use our app, including features accessed, time spent, and interaction patterns.

content.subtitle: Service Provision
content.text: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our healthcare services, including appointment scheduling and medical reminders.

content.subtitle: Communication
content.text: We may use your contact information to send you important updates about your account, appointments, or changes to our services.

content.subtitle: Analytics
content.text: We analyze usage patterns to improve our app's functionality and user experience, always using aggregated and anonymized data.

content.subtitle: Encryption
content.text: All sensitive data is encrypted both in transit and at rest using industry-standard encryption protocols.

content.subtitle: Access Controls
content.text: We implement strict access controls and authentication measures to ensure only authorized personnel can access your data.

content.subtitle: Regular Audits
content.text: Our security practices are regularly audited and updated to meet the latest healthcare data protection standards.

content.subtitle: Healthcare Providers
content.text: With your explicit consent, we may share relevant health information with your healthcare providers to facilitate better care coordination.

content.subtitle: Legal Requirements
content.text: We may disclose information when required by law, such as in response to a court order or government request.

content.subtitle: No Sale of Data
content.text: We never sell your personal or health information to third parties for marketing or commercial purposes.

content.subtitle: Access & Portability
content.text: You have the right to access, download, and transfer your personal data at any time through your account settings.

content.subtitle: Correction & Deletion
content.text: You can update or delete your personal information directly in the app or by contacting our support team.

content.subtitle: Consent Withdrawal
content.text: You may withdraw your consent for data processing at any time, though this may limit some app functionality.

content.subtitle: Privacy Officer
content.text: For privacy-related questions or concerns, contact our Privacy Officer at privacy@healthapp.com

content.subtitle: Support Team
content.text: For general inquiries about data handling, reach out to our support team through the app or at support@healthapp.com
